_source.short_desc: SMS Marketing 360? helps drive more sales.
_source.long_desc: SMS Marketing 360 makes creating text message campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific text messages are sent to specific people at specific times.
_source.pricing_details: Create a free account to get started.
_source.target_audience: Over 20,000 small businesses use our broader business commerce platform so they have everything they need to manage and grow their business in one place.

category_features.name: 2-Way Messaging
category_features.definition: Send and receive text messages in real time

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: MMS
category_features.definition: Send and receive multimedia messages (i.e. photos, videos, and audio recordings)

category_features.name: Mass Texting
category_features.definition: Send messages to multiple subscribers at the same time.

category_features.name: Message Personalization
category_features.definition: Automatically personalize text messages using templates and custom fields

category_features.name: Mobile Coupons
category_features.definition: Electronic coupons delivered to a mobile device that can be exchanged for a discount or rebate when purchasing a product or service

category_features.name: Mobile Keywords
category_features.definition: Unique word that contains letters or numbers that identifies specific campaigns

category_features.name: Polls/Voting
category_features.definition: Create quick polls to keep people engaged

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Scheduled Messaging
category_features.definition: Send individual or bulk text messages at predetermined times

category_features.name: Shortcodes
category_features.definition: Short phone numbers that are typically 5 to 6 digits long which are used to opt-in to SMS campaigns/promotions

category_features.name: Text-to-Win
category_features.definition: Contests and sweepstakes administered via text messages

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Campaigns
category_features.definition: Allows for businesses to run a variety of different campaigns across different channels

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Audience Targeting
category_features.definition: Identify a particular segment of population based on specific criteria and customize your efforts to attract their attention

category_features.name: Behavior Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyze user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Cross Channel Attribution
category_features.definition: Track user conversions from all digital sources

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.name: Heatmaps
category_features.definition: A visual display that uses a color spectrum to show how visitors interact with areas of a web page

category_features.name: Personalization
category_features.definition: Personalization

category_features.name: Retargeting Ads
category_features.definition: Ads that targets visitors who have previously visited a site.

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Canned Responses
category_features.definition: Shortcuts for inputting frequently used messages

category_features.name: Data Recovery
category_features.definition: Ability to restore deleted, hidden, or lost data from an email server/system

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Response Management
category_features.definition: Track status and remediate problems in a centralized way

category_features.name: Routing
category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day?s work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.name: Shared Inboxes
category_features.definition: An email inbox that can be accessed and managed by multiple individuals

category_features.name: Signature Management
category_features.definition: Add and maintain centralized email signature(s) across an organization

category_features.name: Spam Blocker
category_features.definition: Ability to prevent junk or spam messages from entering the system?s main inbox

category_features.name: Whitelisting/Blacklisting
category_features.definition: Control system access and/or deliverability for applications and email addresses

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Customer Management
category_features.definition: Capture and analyze information about your customers and interactions with them

category_features.name: Dispatch Management
category_features.definition: Manage sending personnel and resources to a site as needed

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Equipment Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and maintain equipment used to manufacture and deploy products and services, and to reallocate assets where needed

category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day's work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.definition: Import and export information and reports to and from the program

category_features.name: Lead Capture

category_features.definition: A repository of verified contact information that is provided by software vendor. Software functionality is offered on top of this data

category_features.name: Lead Segmentation
category_features.definition: Divide leads into buckets based on predefined criteria and routing rules

category_features.definition: Ensure the authenticity of each lead by verifying their information, eliminating duplicate leads/contacts, etc.

category_features.name: Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

related_products.short_desc: SMS Marketing 360? helps drive more sales.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing 360 makes creating text message campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific text messages are sent to specific people at specific times.

related_products.short_desc: iCIMS Talent Cloud is a cloud platform for recruiting that enables employers to manage their end-to-end talent hiring lifecycle.
related_products.features: Built for enterprise organizations, iCIMS is the Talent Cloud company that empowers organizations to attract, engage, hire and advance the right talent that builds a diverse, winning workforce. The iCIMS Talent Cloud is complemented by an ecosystem of more than 700 global partners. Yesterday's tools were not designed for the future of work. iCIMS provides innovations that meet employer's new and emerging strategic business and talent needs.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM, used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code access. You can send individual SMS messages even on the free plan, bulk SMS and SMS marketing automation are available to commercial Bitrix24 users, starting at $39/mo. Since we don't add any surcharges on SMS pricing offered by leading SMS providers, we are much cheaper than other SMS marketing services. Currently, you can send text messages in over 100 countries.

related_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM's sms marketing software helps to leverage text messaging to maximize the communication channels you use to connect with your audience. Integrating SMS text messaging into your marketing campaigns or sales and support function can help you engage your audience at just the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SMS marketing software built for small business
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the text (SMS) marketing software built for small business. Thryv integrates your contact list with text (SMS) marketing templates and automation so you can target the right person at the right time with the right message. Include coupons, promotions and interactive buttons that urge recipients to take action.

related_products.short_desc: The powerful texting platform your church and people will love. Send mass texts to your church & engage in two-way text conversations.
related_products.features:
The powerful texting platform your church and people will love.

With Clearstream, you can easily mass text your church and engage in two-way text conversations. But you can also streamline your guest follow-up process with text-to-join Keywords and workflows, manage multiple ministries or campuses with Subaccounts, and much more.

Thousands of churches, from new plants to many of the largest in the U.S., rely on Clearstream to better communicate with their members, and guests through texting.

related_products.short_desc: Mass SMS Text Messaging services. Great for sending bulk text messages, appointment reminders, coupons, sales, and more.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing Services made easy. Instantly send 10 or 100,000 SMS Text messages to any mobile phone number. Easily build an opt-in subscriber list. Schedule text messages to go out any time you want. Track text message delivery. Our plans start with a FREE 14-day trial period. Or try our Annual Plans and pay up-front for one year, and get 20% more messages instantly.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
related_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

related_products.short_desc: Swell helps you modernize your customer engagement through automated and one-to-one texting.
related_products.features: Swell helps you connect with customers and prospects through texting to provide seamless experiences and earn new business. It offers message management for everything from automated reminders to mass text campaigns to one-on-one conversations. With Swell, you can set up automatic review invitations to ask happy customers to leave reviews on the platforms that matter so you can rank higher online and get found by prospects.

related_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
related_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage with your customers using bespoke text message marketing campaigns.
similar_products.features:
Mobiz is a hyper-personalized mobile marketing platform that elevates and innovates customer engagement with data-driven personalization. Using a dynamic landing page template library, users can create and send customized mobile marketing campaigns at scale and via SMS in a few easy steps - all totally code-free.

The platform also offers a growth tool, helping users expand their subscriber list easily and compliantly. 

To learn more, visit https://bit.ly/3dRhnCZ

similar_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

similar_products.short_desc: Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing.
similar_products.features: Reach your customers where they are-their phones. Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands-from retail enterprises to e-commerce entrepreneurs-engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing. We'll help you target the right audience for your messages, and measure your most important metrics to optimize your program. And with our flexible integrations, you can easily connect to the rest of your marketing stack, too. Learn more about our free 30-day trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
similar_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

similar_products.short_desc: SMS texting and live chat for business has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.
similar_products.features: SMS texting and live chat has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers. With no programming required, you can setup your Avochato phone number in minutes to text your prospects, customers, or staff. Segment, import, and broadcast to your contacts to scale your teams communications. Avochato integrates with platforms such as Salesforce, Slack, MS Teams, and Zapier. Enable prospects to text you from a Google Ad with the AdWords API integration.

similar_products.short_desc: EZ Texting delivers the smartest, fastest, easiest, and most reliable ways to connect with your customers and clients.
similar_products.features: EZ Texting is a SaaS company that delivers the fastest, easiest, and most reliable way to connect. It has served over 165,000 customers and is the #1 SMS platform for business users, setting the standard for business texting. Our messaging solutions allow businesses to quickly and effectively reach and engage their mobile audiences. With employees around the world, EZ Texting is continuously recognized as a Best Place to Work, as well as a top product for small and mid-market businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: You need more than just mass texting. Trumpia offers fully automated campaigns, so you can engage subscribers without doing more work.
similar_products.features: Mass texting alone won't give you the results you need, especially when sending irrelevant messages. Trumpia offers more than simple texting features, enabling you to accurately target every message you send. Our software will even carry out entire campaigns for you, so you can engage customers automatically without adding more work to your plate. Trumpia is favored by businesses of all sizes including Fortune 500s. Call us today at 855-912-0700.

similar_products.short_desc: Make marketing your business the easy part with a simple SMS Marketing platform like vcita. Start your free trial today!
similar_products.features: Take your marketing to the next level with simple SMS marketing with vcita. Link each SMS promotion to a beautiful landing page, enabling clients to take revenue-driving actions in a single click. Keep notes and view clients' payment history with ease from a single dashboard, and manage your billing and invoicing liike a pro. Never chase payments again with SMS payment reminders and focus on getting the word out about your services simply and professionally.

similar_products.short_desc: MessageMedia is a global leader in SMS services, providing an engaging messaging platform for over 65,000 businesses.
similar_products.features: We're a mobile messaging solution that helps businesses of all sizes better connect with customers. We create engaging mobile experiences for our 65,000+ global customers and help boost ROI. Find us in the USA, the UK, Australia and NZ.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully featured business text messaging platform to send bulk SMS text messages to customers, staff, and partners.
similar_products.features: TextMagic is a fully featured business text messaging platform that enables companies of all sizes to send bulk SMS text messages to their customers, staff, and partners. The service can be used to send sms notifications, alerts, and confirmations to clients, as well as to conduct SMS marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Whispir is a cloud platform for automating intelligent, rich communications.
similar_products.features: Whispir, Inc. is an all-in-one communications platform designed to help businesses and organizations communicate more humanly with their team and their customers. Whispir's capabilities include a wide range of intelligent messaging solutions, from SMS to email, voice, video, social, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales through the power of texting. Text all your customers in seconds.
similar_products.features: Mobile Text Alerts is an easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales & growth through the power of texting. Get up and running in seconds and enjoy our user-friendly online platform and mobile app, allowing you to easily set up SMS campaigns to market your products/services - engaging with customers and prospects efficiently and effectively. Free up time and hassle with automated messaging, flexible opt-in choices to build your subscriber list, analytics options, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Quick sign up, FREE TRIAL, no credit card required. Send Group SMS, MMS with emoji and short URL tracking. Sign up forms, SMS keywords.
similar_products.features: ProTexting is an SMS marketing platform designed for businesses in all industries. It provides easy to use way to communicate with your customers through group text messaging with emoji and MMS support. You can create text messaging campaigns for mobile surveys, voting, text in questions, text 2 screen, etc. Super FAST sending of your SMS Campaigns. 24/7 monitoring and support. FREE demo and On-boarding sessions are part of the services. FREE Toll-Free number for every account.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Marketing software helps businesses reach and engage their audiences on mobile devices via text messages and mobile optimized promotional offers and notifications.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
related_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Complete social media management tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
related_products.features: Agorapulse is a social media management tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. Additional free tools include Easy Advocacy (employee advocacy / sharing) and AdsReport (Facebook Ads reporting).

related_products.short_desc: ContentStudio is a data-driven content marketing and social media tool that allows you to discover, compose and share engaging content.
related_products.features:
ContentStudio is a multi-use social media management and content marketing tool that allows you to discover, compose and share the best content. It has a suite of products for content discovery, publishing, planning, analytics and automation to help marketing teams work and collaborate efficiently.

It is the perfect tool for discovering trending content, managing multiple social media networks, recycling evergreen posts, analyzing performance, collaborating with the team and a lot more.

related_products.short_desc: Create real connection with best-in-class social media management software | Try Sprout Free
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers powerful social management solutions for leading agencies and brands including Hyatt, Ogilvy, Leo Burnett, Evernote and Microsoft. Sprout enables brands to simplify social management, reporting, publishing, customer service, engagement and much more | Try Sprout Free For 30 Days.

related_products.short_desc: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure.
related_products.features: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure. Streamline teamwork along your entire content management process: manage digital assets, fuel storytelling, polish content, approve messaging, reach your audience, engage your community and measure performance. Now supporting organic content, boosted posts and objective-driven campaigns. All in one collaborative solution.

related_products.short_desc: Social media management software built for small business
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the social media management software built for small business. Thryv integrates with your favorite social media accounts including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and Google+, so you can post content out all at once or schedule posts in advance. Pull from a library of more than 500,000 posts you can tailor to fit your business. Then learn more about your contacts with social data enrichment that connect to their accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social media content discovery & sharing platform. Connect to Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram & Facebook accounts & cut down time by 90%.
related_products.features: Content curation, social media management and employee advocacy platform. Connects with Twitter, LinkedIn & Facebook accounts and cuts down social media management effort by up to 90%. Key features- multiple account management, collaborative social media management, content suggestions, RSS feed addition, content library, advanced post scheduling, group account scheduling, hashtag and @mention suggestions, engagement and click-through metrics, URL shortener, employee advocacy with analytics

related_products.short_desc: Smart, automated social media and messenger marketing platform that allows you to create, schedule and promote content.
related_products.features:
Contenive employs the whole social media management cycle, revealing not just effective content production, but also competitive field analysis, contextual network planning, placement, and analysis of outcomes.
Contenive is a proprietary solution that combines artificial and live intelligence to guarantee the high-quality generation (of visual and textual material) as well as instant posting with little client input.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for social media agencies to manage multiple brands at scale. Low-cost and packed with features.
similar_products.features:
Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for marketing agencies to manage multiple social media accounts at scale, packed with enterprise features such as brand workspaces, taggable content library, client-access portals, clean client reports and white-label services.

No other social media management platform compares to our affordability and usability, backed by our top-rated US-based customer support team.

Start your FREE 14-day trial to see firsthand how you could spend up to 80% less time on SMM.

similar_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing
similar_products.features: Meet Salesforce Social Studio. Listen, engage, and publish using a powerful all-in-one social media marketing and management suite and connect enriched social data to your marketing with sales and service. Analyze conversations from nearly any source to see what your industry and fans are saying. Respond to social posts, manage your community, and provide customer support. Create and approve content for multiple social networks and accounts from desktop or mobile.

similar_products.short_desc: The end-to-end Social Marketing Cloud for the modern marketer and enterprises. Everything you need in a social media management tool.
similar_products.features:
Emplifi Social Marketing Cloud is an end-to-end Social Marketing Platform for modern enterprises that provides a single, centralized solution for all your efforts to understand and drive customers' engagement on social media. Emplifi's AI-powered tools, automation, and real-
time insights improve the entire process of content creation and social media management. 

Get the superpowers every marketer needs to convert your followers to customers - all in one platform!

similar_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
similar_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one Social Media Management solution for publishing, reporting, influencer marketing, benchmarking, and engagement.
similar_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) provides a comprehensive, all-in-one Social Media Management solution. It's a one-stop solution for any marketer's social listening, publishing, engagement, measurement, and benchmarking needs. Brandwatch helps marketers deliver more personalized brand experiences across all digital touchpoints, based on enriched customer profiles. This solution features a highly intuitive and collaborative UI and is complemented by the best support team in the business.

similar_products.short_desc: A centralized platform for multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local pages.
similar_products.features: SOCi is an award-winning localized marketing platform built specifically for multi-location marketers. Our customers include top brands and influencers like Ace Hardware, Sport Clips, and Anytime Fitness who have the impossible challenge of managing their digital presence across hundreds and thousands of locations. As central command for multi-location marketers, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands and their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence.

similar_products.short_desc: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure.
similar_products.features: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure. Streamline teamwork along your entire content management process: manage digital assets, fuel storytelling, polish content, approve messaging, reach your audience, engage your community and measure performance. Now supporting organic content, boosted posts and objective-driven campaigns. All in one collaborative solution.

similar_products.short_desc: SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool.
similar_products.features:
SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool that empowers marketers, content creators, and entrepreneurs with the technology and capabilities they need to grow their businesses and careers. 

SmarterQueue's intelligent social media scheduler enables scheduling automation powered by queues and queue posting plans, content categories, evergreen recycling, visual calendars, and content variations.

It also includes advanced analytics, a social inbox, and content curation.

similar_products.short_desc: Instagram-first social media scheduler with link in bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, collaboration tools.
similar_products.features:
Sked Social is an Instagram-first social media scheduler. With a link-in-bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, and people, place, and product tagging, Sked has your Instagram scheduling sorted.

You can also cross-post your Instagram content to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, YouTube, Google My Business, TikTok and Snapchat - all from the same place.

And if you need external and internal reviews, you can upgrade to get collaboration features.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media SaaS platform for franchises combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy.
similar_products.features: Rallio is a powerful SaaS platform combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy. As the supplier of choice for franchise organizations and small businesses, Rallio enables multi-location brands and SMB operators to optimize their social media engagement, while managing their entire social media presence, online reputation, and online directory listings in one dashboard for all locations.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete social media management tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
similar_products.features: Agorapulse is a social media management tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. Additional free tools include Easy Advocacy (employee advocacy / sharing) and AdsReport (Facebook Ads reporting).

similar_products.short_desc: AI tool to discover and analyze influencers, marketing campaigns on Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and uncover competitors strategy.
similar_products.features: HypeAuditor is a SaaS company that has developed a comprehensive set of tools to discover influencers on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter, and Twitch, verify the authenticity of their accounts, and track the results of their influencer marketing campaigns. All services are based on AI algorithms, allowing HypeAuditor to identify behavioral patterns. HypeAuditor aims to provide the ultimate social media analytics and management platform to ensure our clients work effectively with creators.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media management driven by data science. Find the best combo of emojis, hashtags, words, images and more! Works with Hootsuite!
similar_products.features: Social media management driven by data science for smallest of small business owners around the world to compete against unlimited marketing budgets. Use the power of AI to create, curate and schedule content on major social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Linked, Instagram, Shopify, Wordpress, Medium and more) as well as new ones (ie TikTok). Type social media posts (or blog posts) using built in autocomplete + auto emoji suggest for engaging emojis. Also works with Hootsuite(18M+ users!).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Public Relations software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Public Relations tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Public Relations software allows PR professionals to collaborate effectively with contacts, as well as plan, manage, distribute, and track campaigns. This type of software may also provide media monitoring functionality, competitive media analysis, broadcast solutions, and news media information retrieval solutions to help PR professionals make knowledgeable decisions. Public Relations software may also include job estimating, accounting and client communication features to help PR professionals maintain strong external relationships. Public Relations software is related to Marketing Automation software and Campaign Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reputation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reputation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reputation Management software helps organizations keep on top of what is being said about the organization and their products in various blogs, social networks, and media. Analytical capabilities of Reputation Management software allow marketing departments to measure and evaluate consumers' reactions to marketing campaigns and help companies better plan their future outreach. Reputation Management software is related to Brand Management software and Social Networking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Media Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Media Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Media Marketing software automates the creation, tracking, and management of online campaigns through social sites such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc. This software helps with publishing coupons and promotions and collecting customer response metrics.Social Media Marketing platforms offer integrated email that could be linked to multiple accounts in any of the social networks thus creating a single, go-to place for several simultaneous campaigns. Social Media Marketing software is closely related to Social Monitoring software and many solutions offer both capabilities in one package. For related software see also Campaign Management software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: automated_publishing brand_tracking content_management customer_engagement multi-account_management post_scheduling reporting/analytics social_media_monitoring
